title._content: Widening the Alberta Railway and Coal Company Main Irrigation Canal

description._content: 1900 30.1 x 35.2 cm 1 Black and white photograph Photograph of a barge like dredger scooping dirt out from the sides of a canal. Three men on deck. Behind them is a houseboat or a floating kitchen with a woman standing in the doorway. Written on back widening Alberta Railway and Irrigation Company main ditch at Kimball. Albertan. Reproductions: 35 mm Black and white copy negative To obtain high quality and larger reproductions of this image please visit the Galt Museum & Archives website: www.galtmuseum.com/archives.htm and include thIs number in your request: P19754206000
